scripts.start:vue: docker compose down && docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up hitpoints-ui-vue -d
scripts.start:react: docker compose down && docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up hitpoints-ui-react -d
scripts.start:react-native: docker compose down && docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up hitpoints-api-express -d && npm --prefix ./hitpoints-ui-react-native run start
